results.title: Hydrogen power
results.brief_description: Looks at the developments and associated problems of using hydrogen as an alternative fuel indicating that hydrogen-fuelled cars look very favourable for the future. The film also shows the problems (and proposed solutions) for the storage of hydrogen, an alternative ways to produce hydrogen.

results.title: Hydrocarbons and their structure
results.brief_description: Laboratory demonstration, animation, and structural and scale models are used to explain the five homologous series of hydrocarbons and to show how members of each series differ from the others.

results.title: Hydro-electric power
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Advance Australia”.
Describes the way in which moisture laden cloud becomes rain, and eventually a flowing river with perhaps a waterfall included in its course. The principles of hydro-electric power are explained and model maps are used to show a plan of the Snowy Mountains undertaking.

results.title: Hydraulics
results.brief_description: Explains the principle of hydraulic pressure and shows how liquids are used to transmit power. Simple working models and laboratory experiments visualise the fundamentals of hydraulic pressure, and some of the ways in which it can be utilised.

results.title: Hydatids: a cycle to break
results.brief_description: Illustrates the life cycle of the cyst showing how it is transmitted to humans via dogs who have eaten infected sheep offal. Stresses that efficient disposal of infected sheep offal by farmers can go a long way to preventing the infection of dogs with cysts and that humans should exercise good hygiene habits when handling dogs.

results.title: Hustler white (E)
results.creator_credit: Hustler White productions, Jurgen Bruning, Bruce LaBruce and Rick Castro
results.brief_description: Co-director and star Bruce LaBruce’s sleazy and explicit tour of the LA hustler and porn scene is a humorous and twisted take on Billy Wilder’s “Sunset Boulevard and” the more unsavory moments of “Whatever happened to Baby Jane”. Model Tony Ward stars as Monti- a hustler who becomes the lust object and obsession for Bruce Labruce’s melodramatic journalist, Jurgen Anger. “Hustler White“‘s use of real life hustlers and gay porn actors, along with Labruce’s own gay porn background (he has directed and stared in the underground and very pornographic, Super 8 1/2 and No Skin off my Arse) gives the film a candid documentary feel. Hustler White was co-directed by gay photographer Rick Castro.

results.title: Hush little baby
results.creator_credit: Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Picture Book Parade”.
Family life in 18th century America is pictured with authenticity and charm in this enchanting animated rendition of the traditional folk lullaby. Illustrated and based on the book by Aliki.

results.title: Hush hush, sweet Charlotte
results.creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Associates and Aldrich Company and Robert Aldrich
results.brief_description: Bette Davis plays Charlotte Hollis, a reclusive spinster still mourning the savage murder of the man she loved 37 years ago. When the state wants Charlotte’s grand property to construct a new highway, she turns to her cousin Miriam (Olivia de Havilland) and an old friend, Drew (Joseph Cotton) to help her resist. What follows is a series of chilling scares and shocks. Also stars Agnes Moorehead.

results.title: Hush [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts and Katherine Fry
results.brief_description: Beginning and concluding at an airport, “Hush” is about a family living in a caravan park who are estranged from one another by a secret, unspoken crime that involves one of the sisters. Cast includes Hayley O’Donnell, Marieke Hardy, Saskia Post and Greg Carroll.
